title.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Jan. 15, 1925Adv. See the Special Swedish Film Attraction, "Mr. Arne's Money"A film dramatization of Dr. Selma Lagerlof's famous book at the Julian Theatre 918 Belmont Avenue Next Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday January 20, 21, 22, and 23 from 2 P.M. continuos until 11 P.M.

div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Jan. 15, 1925Adv. SEE THE SPECIAL SWEDISH FILM ATTRACTION, "MR. ARNE'S MONEY"A film dramatization of Dr. Selma Lagerlof's famous book at the Julian Theatre 918 Belmont Avenue Next Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday January 20, 21, 22, and 23 From 2 P.M. continuos until 11 P.M.

body.p: This film is partly played in Bohuslaen, partly in Holland, by Sweden's foremost film stars, to wit: Hjalmar Selander - Concordia Selander - Richard Lund - Mary Johnson - Axel Nilsson
No Swede should miss the opportunity to see this film, which has attracted great attention all over Europe and in the East.
